SELECT tbpost.id ,tbpost.deleted ,tbpost.process ,tbpost.created_at as createdAt ,tbpost.modified_at as modifiedAt
,tbpost.tbuser_id as tbuserId ,tbpost.title ,tbpost.content
,tbuser.name as tbuserName ,tbuser.nick as tbuserNick ,tbuser.img as tbuserImg
FROM tbpost, tbuser WHERE tbpost.id = #{id} AND tbpost.tbuser_id = tbuser.id

SELECT tbpost.id FROM tbpost WHERE tbpost.id is not NULL AND tbpost.deleted = #{deleted} AND tbpost.tbuser_id = #{tbuserId} AND tbpost.title LIKE CONCAT('%', #{title}, '%') ORDER BY tbpost.created_at DESC

SELECT tbpost.id FROM tbpost WHERE tbpost.id is not NULL AND tbpost.deleted = #{deleted} AND tbpost.tbuser_id = #{tbuserId} AND tbpost.title LIKE CONCAT('%', #{title}, '%')
AND STR_TO_DATE(#{cursor}, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s.%f') > tbpost.created_at ORDER BY tbpost.created_at DESC
AND tbpost.created_at > STR_TO_DATE(#{cursor}, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s.%f') ORDER BY tbpost.created_at ASC
AND #{cursor} > tbpost.title ORDER BY tbpost.title DESC
AND tbpost.title > #{cursor} ORDER BY tbpost.title ASC
LIMIT 0, #{perpage}

SELECT tbpost.id FROM tbpost WHERE tbpost.id is not NULL AND tbpost.deleted = #{deleted} AND tbpost.tbuser_id = #{tbuserId} AND tbpost.title LIKE CONCAT('%', #{title}, '%')
